content: Real estate investment trust Sun Communities Inc  said it would buy privately held Carefree Communities Inc for about $1.68 billion from an affiliate of private equity firm Centerbridge Capital Partners II LP.
name: Sun Communities Inc
title: Sun Communities to buy Carefree Communities for about $1.68 billion

content: March 22 Real estate investment trust Sun Communities Inc said it would buy privately held Carefree Communities Inc for about $1.68 billion from an affiliate of private equity firm Centerbridge Capital Partners II LP.
name: Sun Communities Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Sun Communities to buy Carefree Communities for about $1.68 bln

content: * At closing of deal   company will  assume approximately $1.0 billion of debt
name: Sun Communities Inc
title: BRIEF-Sun Communities to buy Carefree Communities for $1.68 bln
